name: Galactic Lander
description: Inspired by the classic arcade Lunar Lander game, in Galactic Lander you control a delicate scientific spaceship which you must deliver from point A to point B, either alone, or with a friend in a co-op level, potentially made by the game's own Steam Workshop community!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core2 Quad Q6600 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 560 TI DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 80 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 670 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection
